CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 24, 1955, pg. A17, reads: "Merry Christmas! - Pittsburgh Girl Friends gave their annual Christmas part at McNeills Catering establishment on Adelaide Street and had a singing good time. Snapped unexpectedly by 'One Shot Photographer' Harris were, seated, Toni Jones, national prexy Billie B. Brown, and out-going local prexy, Hazel Downing. Standing: Slim Hamilton, Dr. H. Raymond Primas and Marribelle; Dr. Lawrence Downing, Bernice Utterback, new local prexy Alberta William; behind her is Ailene [Aileen] Sawyer, Marie Robinson, Sarah Jane Goode and Agnes Stevenson."
TitMainTitle: Group at Pittsburgh Girl Friends Christmas party, seated from left: Toni Jones, Wilhelmina "Billie" Byrd Brown, Hazel Downing; standing: Slim Hamilton, Dr. H. Raymond Primas, Marribelle Primas, Dr. Lawrence Downing, Bernice Utterback, Alberta Williams; in rear: Aileen Sawyer, Marie Robinson, Sarah Jane Goode and Agnes Stevenson in McNeills Catering, Adelaide Street
